about_the_game:
This is a simple and sometimes tricky 3D puzzle game in which the egg-shaped chicken "Tamaniwatori'' hatches eggs.

There are no time limits or factor that change in real time, so you can play at your own pace.


◇How to play
The operation is simple, just move the "Tamaniwatori" one square at a time up, down, left, and right.

If you step on the egg once and move it one space next to it, a "Tamahiyoko" will be born.
The level is cleared when all eggs in the field are hatched and the goal is reached.

Various mechanisms appear in the levels, such as scaffolding that sinks once you step on it, and scaffolding that appears with a switch.

Be careful if you fall into the water, it will be a mistake and you will have to restart the level from the beginning.

There may also be an egg-shaped crocodile called "Tamawani" in the level, which is the natural enemy of "Tamawaniwatori".
"Tamawani" moves along a predetermined route at the same time as "Tamawaniwatori" advances one space. If you get eaten, you will make a mistake, so be careful not to get hit.

As you progress through the game, new worlds will be unlocked and unique mechanisms will increase.

I hope you enjoy it until the end.

*This game was made in Japan, but most of it can be played regardless of language.

There are no time limits or factor that change in real time, so you can play at your own pace.

Various mechanisms appear in the levels, such as scaffolding that sinks once you step on it, and scaffolding that appears with a switch.

Be careful if you fall into the water, it will be a mistake and you will have to restart the level from the beginning.

There may also be an egg-shaped crocodile called "Tamawani" in the level, which is the natural enemy of "Tamawaniwatori".
"Tamawani" moves along a predetermined route at the same time as "Tamawaniwatori" advances one space. If you get eaten, you will make a mistake, so be careful not to get hit.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.12
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000, Iris 5000. Most Mac's from 2012 and on.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Tamaniwatori's Puzzle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7+
  • Processor: intel Core i5-7300U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This is a simple and sometimes tricky 3D puzzle game in which the egg-shaped chicken "Tamaniwatori'' hatches eggs. While avoiding the natural enemy "Tamawani", advance on the various scaffolds set up, hatch all the eggs, and aim for the goal.
